biotools.summary: fastv is a computational toolset for rapid identification of SARS-CoV-2, other viruses, and microorganisms from sequencing data. This tool supports both short reads (Illumina, BGI, etc.) and long reads (ONT, PacBio, etc.).

bioschemas.name: fastv
bioschemas.summary: fastv is a computational toolset for rapid identification of SARS-CoV-2, other viruses, and microorganisms from sequencing data. This tool supports both short reads (Illumina, BGI, etc.) and long reads (ONT, PacBio, etc.).
